Bug Reporting & Contributing

Bug Reporting
Please follow these steps:
  1. Search in the issue section first. There might already be an answer for similar issue. Do check both open and closed issues.
  2. If there's no previous issue found, then please create a new issue in https://github.com/isteven/angular-multi-select/issues.
  3. Please replicate the problem in JSFiddle or Plunker (or any other online JS collaboration tool), and include the URL in the issue you are creating.
Contributing
Notes on contributing and Pull Requests (PRs):
  1. I will prioritize PRs which serve the greater good with the least complexity.
  2. If I don't accept a PR, it means either:
    • I am working on the same thing, or
    • It doesn't serve greater good, or
    • It conflicts with existing functionalities

As of now, some of the most wanted features are:
  • AJAX (or promise objects)
  • Lazy loading
